about_the_game:
The war has not only touched the land, but also seas and oceans. You're the only one who can harm the enemy!


Take control of one of the most dangerous American ships during World War II and become a capitan of the elite crew of torpedo boats. Patrol designated sea areas and destroy units, weakening their military strength.

Take care about your ship and crew! Your torpedo boat won't be a threat if you forget about the maintenance of equipment and installations on board. Watch out for fires!



Grow strong! Upgrade equipment, increase the firepower of your boat and spread scare at sea.

Remember to arm yourself! Before each mission, equip yourself with torpedoes and mines, and check your ammunition. You can have a limited amount of bullets on your boat, so use them wisely!

Explore places where the enemy is storing resources. Be careful, they're well guarded. If necessary, use mines that are great for escapes.

Become a real captain aboard an American torpedo boat and make history!

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
